basics.name: Francesco Zorzi
basics.label: Full-Stack Software Engineer | .NET & Modern Web Technologies
basics.summary: **Software Engineer Manager** with *5+ years of experience* in **.NET development** and **modern web technologies**. Proven track record leading development teams and delivering scalable software solutions in *financial services* and *emerging tech companies*. Expertise in **C#**, **.NET 8**, **Entity Framework Core**, and **full-stack development** with strong focus on code quality and agile methodologies.

work.name: Technesthai
work.summary: Lead a team of developers in full-stack development using modern .NET technologies and cloud infrastructure. Collaborate closely with CTO to deliver scalable software solutions and establish development best practices.
highlights: *Backend:* Actively develop and maintain applications using **.NET 8**, **C#** and **Entity Framework Core** with both **PostgreSQL** and **SQL Server** databases for various client projects
*Frontend:* Build responsive user interfaces using **Vue.js 3**, **Vuetify 3**, and modern **JavaScript** with component-based architecture
*AWS Cloud:* Collaborate with CTO in managing AWS infrastructure, daily operations with **S3 storage**, **CloudWatch monitoring**, and deployment orchestration using **Docker containers**

*Team Leadership:* Manage team workload, define project priorities with stakeholders, and ensure **95%+ on-time delivery** through mixed **Agile/Waterfall** methodology approach tailored to project requirements
*Code Quality:* Established and enforce **coding standards**, **code review processes**, and **CI/CD best practices**, resulting in improved code quality and reduced technical debt

work.name: iason
work.summary: Progressed from Junior Consultant to Manager, leading teams in Counterparty Credit Risk (CCR) and Market Data projects. Developed and maintained financial applications using .NET technologies and Java for global banking clients.
highlights: *Manager:* Led 8-person IT team. Successfully migrated legacy ATS application to **Vue.js** and **Vuetify** with **.NET backend**, improving performance and user satisfaction significantly

*Senior Consultant:* Led CCR and Market Data teams focusing on **SA-CCR** and **FRTB compliance**. Served as functional analyst providing technical guidance for regulatory implementations using **Java**

*Consultant:* Managed 4-person development team, implementing CCR application updates using **Java** to meet evolving regulatory requirements. Acted as functional analyst for SA-CCR calculations and risk metrics

*Junior Consultant:* Developed and enhanced CCR applications, **reduced critical bugs** through systematic debugging and code optimization using **Java**. Specialized in exposure calculation algorithms for financial risk management

courses: Strong analytical and problem-solving foundation with mathematics and engineering principles
International experience in financial technology and engineering

projects.name: SplitDuo
projects.description: A lightweight, open-source expense splitting application written in **.NET 9**, **Nuxt 4** and **NuxtUI 4** designed for couples and two-person households. SplitDuo provides a simple, **self-hosted alternative to existing solutions like Splitwise and Cospend**.

projects.name: PodCats
projects.description: Comprehensive podcast management platform, but with cats üê±. Built with **Vue.js 3** and **Vuetify 3** frontend consuming a **RESTful API backend in GoLang**. Features include **multi-user authentication**, **RSS feed processing**, **automated cron jobs**, and **universal search capabilities**.

projects.name: HomeLab Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-managed infrastructure. Started with Raspberry Pi and **Pi-Hole**, expanded to managing a **Proxmox virtualization cluster** with dedicated **opnSense firewall VM**. Hands-on experience with **containerization**, **networking**, **security**, and **infrastructure automation**.
